entries.title: Like it or not, email is still our greatest tool - and the source of some of our biggest threats
entries.description: We're told to look for telltale signs of phishing attacks - but that's hard when they look just like real emails.

entries.title: It's a very personal gadget and personally I'm disturbed
entries.description: Yes, of course it may be useful, but is this the best way to present it?

entries.title: Southwest Airlines sent me a personal message. Then, things got slightly uglier
entries.description: Crisis mangement needs a lot of executive management skill. Perhaps more than Southwest currently has.

entries.title: I spent an hour with a new, ChatGPT-inspired AI chatbot, and I may die laughing
entries.description: Talk to a robot and you may end up feeling troubled. Or even puntd.
